data.message: Why am I not seeing posts from friends from the past 24 hours in my news feed? The news feed is getting worse and worse. I try to scroll down and it just stops!!!! I clicked most recent and still don't see my friends posts.FACEBOOK please respond to my message, thank you.

replies.message: Hey Brock. Your News Feed should be filled with updates from your friends and people and Pages you follow. If you feel you're missing stories, you can use the different News Feed controls to adjust your settings or create a Close Friends list and receive a notification every time someone posts. To learn about News Feed settings, visit: http://on.fb.me/1xdvN0d. For information about Close Friends list, visit: http://on.fb.me/1xdvKlh. -Jenny
